There is one more class that still uses "isReseved()". Could you check if we need to update it too ? https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security/blob/e97d30d204c42c1a9518c85039144fcdadc0e590/src/main/java/com/amazon/opendistroforelasticsearch/security/dlic/rest/api/AccountApiAction.java#L201
